      • makeAccount

        public static void makeAccount(java.lang.String un,
                               java.lang.String password)
        Parameters:
        un: - username of user
        password: - unhashed password of user Generates random salt for user and hashes password accordingly Creates user with random user identifier link (userLink), lowercase username, hashed password, and user salt; adds user information to file and to userAccounts ArrayList

      • signIn

        public static void signIn(java.lang.String input)
        Prompts user to input username, and checks to see if it's in the database. If it is, it prompts user to input a password. If the hashed (password + user salt) matches the hashed password, the user can access the account.

      • userInData

        public static int userInData(java.lang.String username)
        Checks to see if the given username is in the list of users
